title: AZIR NEEDS HELP
body: My favorite Mid lane champion, Azir, has just lost his "pizazz" considering he was nerfed pretty hard, all i want is to bring back old azir,  ya know? The cd reduction giving attack speed, I don't really mind the damage not stacking, but I'd think if you nerf the stack, then you should buff the slow, even if its just a little. Thanks{{champion:268}} {{item:3101}}

replies.body: He has the lowest winrate sitting at 41%. I do hope that they give back the knockup of the E atleast,stacking Q's I don't mind.
I assume if he does horrible at worlds or is hardly picked they will buff him. But if he's still a very highly contested pick then he'll prob stay the same.
